data.title: Law firm and lawyer rankings from The Legal 500 Europe, Middle East & Africa guide
data.meta_description: Market-leading rankings and editorial commentary - see the top law firms & lawyers for Intellectual property in Serbia
data.text:
‘The MJB team is exceptional in Serbia – knowledgeable, professional, responsive, and great value for reasonable fees.’

‘Exceptional cooperation that is reflected in its high levels of professionalism and exceptional knowledge of this field.’

‘Clients are satisfied with the results and overall cooperation.’

‘Excellent knowledge of IP. Provides expert advice with good explanations.’

‘Extremely reliable regarding IP portfolio management.’

‘Dejan Bogranović is highly recommended – the litigation star of the practice. His reputation is well known on the market and clients have complete faith in his ability to protect their interests before the competent authorities.’

‘Dejan Bogdanović is a true professional – an unrivalled IP expert in Serbia and great to work with.’

‘Mara Janković ensures that brands are protected.’

‘The main strength is the business-oriented approach.’

‘They provide very useful and practical legal advice that also includes non-legal aspects of business.’

‘Vladimir Bojanović is always available to share his opinion on every legal question and to help resolve obstacles that arise, showing high-level competence in IP law.’

‘All the lawyers from the BOPA team are always cooperative and able to provide timely support for day-to-day operations.’

‘Always provides optimal advice.’

‘What clients particularly appreciate is their dedication, availability even on short notice when urgent matters arise, and highly professional correspondence.’

‘Vladimir Bojanović enjoys an impeccable market reputation as a creative and commercially-aware lawyer.’

‘Aleksandra Stojanović is an innovative individual who is one of BOPA’s best assets.’

‘The team’s proactive communication, timely updates, and commitment to excellence leaves no room for ambiguity or uncertainty.’

‘Thanks to their tireless efforts, clients achieve favourable outcomes.’

‘Nikola Kliska is a lawyer that clients are happy to have in their corner.’

‘As a one-stop-shop, they are a go-to firm for trade marks in the region.’

‘Clients value that the firm is happy to provide fee estimates prior to taking on a matter – provides security for clients engaging in cross-border portfolio management or enforcement work.’

‘The team approaches clients’ situations with a unique blend of expertise, diligence and determination.’

‘Nikola Kliska is terrific for trade mark matters and takes on mandates in Croatia, Serbia and Bosnia seamlessly, always having the clients’ best interests at heart.’

‘Nikola Kliska navigates clients through the intricacies of AI brilliantly.’

‘Clients enjoy perfect cooperation with the firm. It is definitely one of the best, if not the best, law firms in Serbia.’

‘Andrea Radonjanin is one of the key figures in IP law in Serbia.’

‘In relation to their IP department, they are very qualified and have huge knowledge of this area of law.’

‘Andrea Radonjanini is always willing to discuss new trends and complex issues in IP law.’

‘What makes Andrea Radonjanin so unique is the huge knowledge that she has developed over the years.’

‘Possesses a formidable breadth of expertise that spans across diverse international jurisdictions.’

‘Andrea Radonjanin is a true expert.’

‘Andrea Radonjanin possesses extensive expertise and a profound understanding of this domain, making her an invaluable resource for any pertinent guidance.’

‘Very knowledgeable on IP and the practical nuances of the Serbian jurisdiction. A reliable legal partner.’

‘Adapts to the unique characteristics of unconventional and/or international clients.’

‘Alex Petrović thinks out of the box, providing creative solutions.’

‘Take their time to listen and propose comprehensive strategies.’

‘They really do a great job – very precise and very fast. A great experience to cooperate with them.’

‘The team is brilliant, easy to communicate with, and open to implementing new technologies, new ideas and new processes that are innovative. It’s always a pleasure working with the team and to be its business partner.’

‘Alex Petrović always provides great advice on IP matters, with the client’s interest as a priority. He understands and adapts to the client’s requests and processes.’

‘Dragan Psodorov is accurate, understanding and reliable.’

‘JPM is a trailblazer in the legal industry, with a unique blend of strengths and capabilities that make it a standout choice.’

‘Their commitment to innovation, diversity, and a client-centric service sets a high bar for other firms to follow.’

‘JPM is not just a law firm, it’s a partner in clients’ success and a pioneer in the legal profession in Serbia.’

‘JPM’s team is not only comprised of highly-skilled attorneys but individuals who are deeply committed to their clients’ success.’

‘The firm’s approach to client service is unparalleled, with a focus on understanding clients’ unique needs and delivering tailor-made solutions. This client-centric approach sets JPM apart from the crowd.’

‘JPM & Partners is one of the leading full-service law firms in Serbia – knowledgeable, professional, and with great business sense. JPM has a big team of hard-working lawyers who are results driven.’

‘Aleksandar Popović is an outstanding lawyer with vast experience in all IP-related matters. Clients are completely satisfied with his services. He is completely client oriented and always available, providing accurate, precise information and clear advice.’

‘Miloš Maksimović is an energetic and dedicated lawyer – always proactive, supportive and quick to react.’

‘Stankovic & Partners’ specialist IP team has strengthened considerably in recent years. They are able to provide a wide range of IP advice and have a good understanding of both domestic and international perspectives.’

‘Takes the trouble to acquire an impressive level of knowledge about clients’ industries and their commercial objectives internationally – something that, when combined with their knowledge of the law, makes them remarkable.’

‘Nenad Stankovic, Andjelka Radovanović, Mitar Simonovic and Tijana Milišić all provide invaluable advice, and are not only great to deal with but prioritise clients’ business aims and objectives.’

‘Good organisational skills and contacts.’

‘Clear and effective communication.’

‘They have a deep understanding of collective copyright management issues.’

‘They are dedicated to working with actors, advocate for the rights of actors and film artists, and have excellent knowledge in this field. They also engage in negotiations with government authorities for actors’ rights. Exceptional team!’

‘Nikolina Vujinović – clients value her commitment and work that is not only financially rewarding but also socially responsible – dedicated to raising awareness about the importance of copyright and related rights’ issues.’

‘Clients’ experience of working with this team is great, as it relies on the trust built up over the years, as well as an exceptional track record.’

‘Clients are confident that they are in capable hands and that the team has their best interests as its core motivation. Collaboration with them on data protection and cross-border issues is exceptional.’

‘What truly stands out is the commitment to clients’ success. They have consistently gone above and beyond to provide tailored solutions that address unique challenges. Their responsiveness and dedication to making sure clients understand the legal implications are highly valuable qualities.’

‘Tijana Žunić Marić’s and Nemanja Žunić’s advice is always thoughtful and succinct, and they are a pleasure to work with.’

‘Working with Tijana Žunić Marić and Jelena Đukanović is a true privilege.’

‘Tijana Žunić Marić and Jelena Đukanović – what sets them apart is their remarkable ability to navigate the intricate landscape of cross-border data regulations in a way that is not only legally sound but also practical for business.’

‘Tijana Žunić Marić’s deep understanding of data protection intricacies help ensure operations are in line with the latest regulations.’

Jelena Đukanović’s attention to detail and strategic insights consistently exceed expectations.’
